channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Censorship
channel.description: Can you guys quick censoring "fu[b][/b]ck"? It's fu[b][/b]cking annoying

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Censorship
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:55, topic:521323”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=639837.msg4314024#msg4314024 date=1371162893]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=639837.msg4313977#msg4313977 date=1371160629]

You would support a capitalist idea over a socialist?

This forum is already capitalist, MITB earns money by underpaying his staff.
[/quote]Does he pay them at all?

Also, if you weren’t being sarcastic, this forum is not capitalist.

I’m not being sarcastic.
[/quote]I get the feeling you are.[/quote]I have never known bowser to be sarcastic…

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Censorship
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:51, topic:521323”]^ or maybe some of us have better things to do[/quote]Then you don’t have to worry about becoming a moderator, do you?

This is exactly why staff that haven’t been active in ages are still staff - it’s all volunteer. If they were paid it would be different, but it’s a waste of money and ultimately pointless.

Read full topic
